overview:
Ruben Haas is Managing Director and Co-Founder at ad2games.

Before starting HitFox, Ruben Haas founded and managed build.UP, a company which provides skill diagnostics, tutoring and career consulting to students and young professionals. He started his professional career at Waterland Private Equity where he analyzed fast growing markets and scalable business models.

Ruben studied International Business Administration in Germany and Dubai.
